name: 葛如鈞
objective:
本課程之目的在於介紹情境劇本法 (scenario) 之相關知識與其在說故事（storytelling）上之應用。藉由此課程的學習，學生可以了解如何使用代表性的角色擬定以及故事板的操作以發現關鍵設計議題。
The aim of this course is to introduce knowledge of the Scenario Method and its application in storytelling. In this course, students will learn how to use representative role modeling and storytelling to discover key design applications. In this course, students will learn how to use representative characterization and storyboarding to discover key design issues.
